title: If I make Wudu from a bucket, is the wudu valid & water still pure? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Bailey from Bangladesh alayum uh shik uh some people make Udo they take some water in a bucket and they dip their hand and make Udo so is this way the udoo valid and what about the water this is valid and it would not change the nature of the water that you dip your hands in it and you take scoops and you make woodo then you put your hand again you make rinse your nose and you put your hand and wash your face you put your hand and some drops falls into the bucket this has no impact on the nature of the water
